page.title: 09A DAY IN MY LIFE-SCHOOL DAY.
page.content: On Friday Mum wakes me at 7-30a.m. I go to the bathroom,wash and put on my school uniform.I only have a cup of coffee for breakfast,then I clean my teeth.I get my bag and packed lunch- sandwiches,yoghurt,cake and fruit and wait to catch the bus for school.We arrive about 8-30 and play until 9a.m. when we have an Assembly.We read until 9-45 and do speed work on tables.After break we do English.Dinner is at 12 and we play until 1-15p.m.We do map work and in nice weather we then go to play games at Bodmin.I arrive home at 4-15,play tennis,have my tea and at 7p.m. I go to the Youth Club.Dad picks me up.I have supper,clean my teeth,write in my diary and go to bed. {Girl aged 10.
